Corner Recovery ○.description_game: Slightly recover endurance on a corner with efficient turning.
Corner Recovery ○.description_detailed: At a random point on any corner, your stamina will slightly recover

Straightaway Recovery.description_game: Slightly recover endurance on a straight.

Lay Low.description_game: Slightly recover endurance when the way ahead is jammed early-race.

Pace Strategy.description_game: Slightly recover endurance when passed by another runner mid-race.
Pace Strategy.description_detailed: If someone overtakes you during the mid-race, your stamina will slightly recover

Calm in a Crowd.description_game: Slightly recover endurance when surrounded mid-race.

Preferred Position.description_detailed: Pace Chaser・If you're in the first half of the pack at a random point during the mid-race, your stamina will slightly recover

Standing By.description_detailed: End Closer・If you're in the back of the pack at a random point during the mid-race, your stamina will slightly recover

Wait-and-See.description_game: Slightly decrease fatigue when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Sprint)

Watchful Eye.description_game: Slightly decrease fatigue when positioned toward the back early-race. (Mile)

Rosy Outlook.description_game: Slightly decrease fatigue when in the lead mid-race. (Medium)

Deep Breaths.description_game: Slightly decrease fatigue by taking a breather upon entering a straight. (Long)

Extra Tank.description_game: Slightly regain the energy to run after exhausting strength. (Long)

Soft Step.description_game: Slightly decrease fatigue when moving sideways. (Medium)
Soft Step.description_detailed: Medium・Beyond the first 10 seconds of the race, if you move right or left, your stamina will slightly recover

Passing Pro.description_game: Slightly decrease fatigue when determined to pass another runner. (Long)
Passing Pro.description_detailed: Long・Become slightly harder to tire when overtaking

Moxie.description_game: Slightly reduce fatigue on an uphill. (Front Runner)
Moxie.description_detailed: Front Runner・During any uphill beyond the first 10 seconds of the race, your stamina will slightly recover

Hydrate.description_detailed: Pace Chaser・Slightly recover stamina in mid-race

After-School Stroll.description_game: Slightly reduce fatigue on a downhill. (End Closer)
After-School Stroll.description_detailed: End Closer・Become slightly harder to tire out on downhills

Levelheaded.description_game: Slightly regain composure by calming down when the way ahead is jammed. (End Closer)

Triple 7s.description_detailed: Slightly restore stamina when the remaining distance is 777m

Shake It Out.description_game: Slightly recover endurance after activating many skills late-race.
Shake It Out.description_detailed: If you activate at least 3 other skills during the late-race, your stamina will slightly recover

Swinging Maestro.description_game: Recover endurance on a corner with efficient turning.
Swinging Maestro.description_detailed: At a random point on any corner, your stamina will recover

Iron Will.description_game: Recover endurance when the way ahead is jammed early-race.

Indomitable.description_game: Recover endurance when passed by another runner mid-race.

Restless.description_game: Reduce fatigue on an uphill. (Front Runner)

Serenity.description_game: Regain composure by calming down when the way ahead is jammed. (End Closer)

U=ma2.description_game: Recover endurance when conserving energy on a corner in the second half of the race.

Rising Dragon.description_game: Increase velocity when passing another runner on the outside on the final corner. (Late Surger)
Rising Dragon.description_detailed: Late Surger・Increases speed when overtaking from the outside on the final corner

Sturm und Drang.description_game: Move up in preparation to close the gap late-race. (End Closer)

Blinding Flash.description_game: Increase spurting ability when positioned toward the back late-race. (Sprint)

Mile Maven.description_game: Widen the margin when in the lead early-race. (Mile)

Killer Tunes.description_game: Increase positioning ability when positioned toward the front mid-race. (Medium)

Unyielding.description_game: Increase ability to fight back when passed by another runner on the final corner. (Medium)

Innate Experience.description_game: Increase velocity when near the inner rail on the final corner. (Long)
Innate Experience.description_detailed: Long・During the Final Corner, if you're running next to the inner fence, your speed will increase

Staggering Lead.description_game: Increase ability to maintain the lead when leading by a large margin mid-race. (Sprint)

Changing Gears.description_game: Increase passing ability when positioned toward the front mid-race. (Mile)

Vanguard Spirit.description_game: Increase ability to maintain the lead when leading by a large margin mid-race. (Long)

Overwhelming Pressure.description_game: Increase velocity when passing another runner late-race. (Long)

15,000,000 CC.description_game: Increase velocity on an uphill. (Late Surger)

Trending in the Charts!.description_game: Increase velocity when engaged in a challenge mid-race. (Dirt)
Trending in the Charts!.description_detailed: Dirt・If you're being blocked from the side during the mid-race, your speed will increase

Certain Victory.description_game: Increase velocity with an indomitable fighting spirit when on the heels of another runner toward the front on the final straight.

Legacy of the Strong.description_game: Increase velocity when pressured by another runner and running out of energy toward the front on the final corner or later.

Warning Shot!.description_game: Slightly increase velocity with a long spurt starting halfway through the race.
Warning Shot!.description_detailed: If you're in the second half of the pack halfway through the race, your speed will slightly increase

Xceleration.description_game: Become stronger at challenging rivals and moderately increase velocity when positioned toward the front with 200m or less remaining.
Xceleration.description_detailed: Increase speed slightly when close to the lead in last 200m

Red Ace.description_game: Slightly swell with the determination to stay number one in the second half of the race.

Focused Mind.description_game: Moderately increase velocity with a strong turn of foot when passing another runner toward the back on the final straight.

Corazón ☆ Ardiente.description_game: Slightly hang on to the advantage when positioned toward the front with energy to spare on the final straight.

Empress's Pride.description_game: Moderately increase velocity with the stride of an empress when passing another runner toward the back on the final corner.

1st Place Kiss☆.description_game: Slightly increase ability to break out of the pack on the straight after engaging in a challenge toward the front on the final corner.

V Is for Victory!.description_game: Refuse to back down from a challenge, moderately increasing velocity on the final straight.

Class Rep + Speed = Bakushin.description_game: Moderately increase velocity with BAKUSHIN power when engaged in a challenge toward the front in the second half of the race.
Class Rep + Speed = Bakushin.description_detailed: While fighting for the lead during the second part of the race, lightly increase your speed through displaying your Bakushin power

Luck Be with Me!.description_game: Moderately clear a path forward with the power of divination when the way ahead is jammed late-race.

I Can Win Sometimes, Right?.description_game: Moderately increase velocity with an arousal of fighting spirit when positioned 3rd and about to lose late-race.
I Can Win Sometimes, Right?.description_detailed: When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, you gain a little bit more fighting spirit and lightly increase your speed

Call Me King.description_game: Increase velocity in a true display of skill with 200m remaining after racing calmly.

Shooting Star.description_game: Ride the momentum and increase velocity after passing another runner toward the front late-race.

The View from the Lead Is Mine!.description_game: Increase velocity by drawing on all remaining strength when in the lead by a fair margin on the final straight.

Sky-High Teio Step.description_game: Greatly increase velocity with flashy footwork when closing the gap to runners ahead on the final straight.

Triumphant Pulse.description_game: Greatly increase ability to break out of the pack by opening up a path when positioned toward the front with 200m remaining.
Triumphant Pulse.description_detailed: Be close to the lead during the last 200m to make it easier to break through and find a way through the field

Anchors Aweigh!.description_game: Moderately increase velocity steadily with a long spurt starting halfway through the race.
Anchors Aweigh!.description_detailed: If you're in the second half of the pack halfway through the race, your speed will increase

Cut and Drive!.description_game: Become stronger at challenging rivals and increase velocity when positioned toward the front with 200m or less remaining.
Cut and Drive!.description_detailed: Increase speed when close to the lead in last 200m

Resplendent Red Ace.description_game: Swell with the determination to stay number one in the second half of the race.

Where There's a Will, There's a Way.description_game: Increase velocity with a strong turn of foot when passing another runner toward the back on the final straight.

The Duty of Dignity Calls.description_game: Increase velocity with the determination to not be overtaken when positioned toward the front on the final corner.

Victoria por plancha ☆.description_game: Hang onto the advantage when positioned toward the front with energy to spare on the final straight.

This Dance Is for Vittoria!.description_game: Increase velocity with royal brilliance when engaged in a challenge toward the front on the final corner.

Behold Thine Emperor's Divine Might.description_game: Greatly increase velocity on the final straight after passing another runner 3 times late-race.

Blazing Pride.description_game: Increase velocity with the stride of an empress when passing another runner toward the back on the final corner.

∴win Q.E.D..description_game: Increase velocity by deriving the winning equation when passing another runner toward the front on the final corner.

Flashy☆Landing.description_game: Increase ability to break out of the pack on the straight after engaging in a challenge toward the front on the final corner.

G00 1st. F∞;.description_game: Increase velocity when positioned toward the front after making it to the final straight without faltering.

Blue Rose Closer.description_game: Increase velocity with strong willpower when breaking out of the pack on the final straight.

Our Ticket to Win!.description_game: Refuse to back down from a challenge, increasing velocity on the final straight.

Genius x Bakushin = Victory.description_game: Increase velocity with BAKUSHIN power when engaged in a challenge toward the front in the second half of the race.
Genius x Bakushin = Victory.description_detailed: During the later half of the race, your speed increases when competing for the lead

I See Victory in My Future!.description_game: Clear a path forward with the power of divination when the way ahead is jammed late-race.

Just a Little Farther!.description_game: Increase velocity with flaring fighting spirit when positioned 3rd and about to lose late-race.
Just a Little Farther!.description_detailed: When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, your speed increases

Prideful King.description_game: Greatly increase velocity in a true display of skill with 200m remaining after racing calmly.

#LookatCurren.description_game: Gain momentum and begin to advance when passing another runner while well-positioned around halfway through the race.

Nemesis.description_game: Increase velocity with smoldering ambition when moving up from a position toward the back of the pack on the final corner.

SPARKLY☆STARDOM.description_game: Become empowered against ceding the spotlight when about to lose the lead on a straight mid-race.
SPARKLY☆STARDOM.description_detailed: If you're in the front during a mid-race straight and competing for position, your speed and acceleration will increase

Shadow Break.description_game: Increase velocity with beastly strength when passing another runner on the outside on the final corner or later.
Shadow Break.description_detailed: If you're passing from the outside during the Final Corner or beyond, your speed will increase; if someone was blocking you from the side during the mid-race, your speed will increase even more

Eternal Moments.description_game: Increase velocity when starting to make a move from a position toward the front mid-race.
Eternal Moments.description_detailed: If you're near the front during the mid-race and try to overtake someone, your speed will increase

Flowery☆Maneuver.description_game: Increase velocity when passing another runner toward the front on the final corner. If passing toward the back, increase acceleration instead.
Flowery☆Maneuver.description_detailed: If you overtake someone during the Final Corner or beyond, then: 1) if you're in the front, your speed will increase; 2) if you're in the middle of the pack, your acceleration will increase

You and Me! One-on-One!.description_game: Increase velocity when passing another runner on the outside toward the back on the final straight.
You and Me! One-on-One!.description_detailed: During the Final Corner or beyond, if you were in the back of the pack and passed someone from the outside, then during the Final Straight, your speed will increase

Lights of Vaudeville.description_game: Greatly increase velocity with a dazzling display when just breaking out of the pack toward the front on the final straight.
Lights of Vaudeville.description_detailed: During the late-race or beyond, if you were ever in the front with another girl behind you, then with 300 m remaining in the race, your speed will greatly increase

KEEP IT REAL..description_game: Moderately increase acceleration steadily with a captivating performance when starting to make a move from midpack in the second half of the race.
KEEP IT REAL..description_detailed: In the second half of the race, if you're about to overtake someone from the middle of the pack, your speed will slightly increase

A Kiss for Courage.description_game: Increase velocity with an enthusiastic "Lets go!" when positioned toward the front in the second half of the race after recovering endurance with a skill.
A Kiss for Courage.description_detailed: In the second half of the race, increase speed when you recover stamina with your skills while being in front

I Never Goof Up!.description_game: Aim for the front with unwavering determination when passing another runner from midpack or further back on a corner late-race.
I Never Goof Up!.description_detailed: If you overtake someone during the late-race or beyond, your speed and acceleration will slightly increase

Schwarzes Schwert.description_game: Increase velocity in a dash for the lead after running calmly and according to plan up until the final straight.
Schwarzes Schwert.description_detailed: If you haven't panicked (kakari) during the race and you're 3rd or worse during the Final Straight, your speed will increase; bonus speed if you've been in the middle of the pack for the entire race

Bountiful Harvest.description_game: Increase velocity with a surge of great fortune when pressured by another runner toward the back in the second half of the race.
Bountiful Harvest.description_detailed: During the second half of the race, if you're not in the front and someone is trying to overtake you, your speed will increase

Corner Adept ×.description_game: Moderately decrease velocity on a corner with clumsy turning.

Defeatist.description_game: Moderately increase urge to give up when positioned around the very back on the final straight.

Reckless.description_game: Moderately increase carelessness when in the lead with around 200m remaining.
Reckless.description_detailed: Tends to get off-guard when leading at the remaining 200m

Corner Acceleration ○.description_game: Slightly increase acceleration on a corner with masterful turning.

Straightaway Acceleration.description_game: Slightly increase acceleration on a straight.

Nimble Navigator.description_game: Slightly increase maneuverability when the way ahead is blocked in the last spurt.

Early Lead.description_game: Slightly increase ability to go to the front early-race. (Front Runner)

Final Push.description_game: Slightly increase ability to keep the lead on the final corner. (Front Runner)
Final Push.description_detailed: Front Runner・At a random point during the Final Corner, if you're in the lead, your acceleration will slightly increase

Straightaway Spurt.description_game: Slightly increase acceleration on a straight in the last spurt. (End Closer)
Straightaway Spurt.description_detailed: End Closer・During any Last Spurt straight, your acceleration will slightly increase

Sprinting Gear.description_game: Slightly increase acceleration on a straight. (Sprint)

Updrafters.description_game: Slightly increase passing ability when positioned toward the back late-race. (Mile)
Updrafters.description_detailed: Mile・If you're in the second half of the pack at a random point during the late-race, your acceleration will slightly increase

Countermeasure.description_game: Slightly increase passing ability when positioned toward the front mid-race. (Sprint)

Acceleration.description_game: Slightly increase acceleration when passing another runner mid-race. (Mile)

Second Wind.description_game: Slightly increase acceleration when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Front Runner)

Shrewd Step.description_game: Slightly increase ability to navigate smoothly. (Pace Chaser)

Straight Descent.description_game: Slightly improve running on a downhill. (Pace Chaser)

Tactical Tweak.description_game: Slightly increase acceleration when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Pace Chaser)

Highlander.description_game: Slightly improve running on an uphill.

Groundwork.description_game: Slightly increase acceleration after activating many skills early-race.
Groundwork.description_detailed: Slightly increase acceleration when many skills are activated during the early-race

Corner Connoisseur.description_game: Increase acceleration on a corner with masterful turning.

No Stopping Me!.description_game: Increase maneuverability when the way ahead is blocked in the last spurt.

Taking the Lead.description_game: Increase ability to go to the front early-race. (Front Runner)

Unrestrained.description_game: Increase ability to keep the lead on the final corner. (Front Runner)
Unrestrained.description_detailed: Front Runner・At a random point during the Final Corner, if you're in the lead, your acceleration will increase

Encroaching Shadow.description_game: Increase acceleration on a straight in the last spurt. (End Closer)
Encroaching Shadow.description_detailed: End Closer・During any Last Spurt straight, your acceleration will increase

Furious Feat.description_game: Increase passing ability when positioned toward the back late-race. (Mile)
Furious Feat.description_detailed: Mile・If you're in the second half of the pack at a random point during the late-race, your acceleration will increase

Plan X.description_game: Increase passing ability when positioned toward the front mid-race. (Sprint)

Step on the Gas!.description_game: Increase acceleration when passing another runner mid-race. (Mile)

Reignition.description_game: Increase acceleration when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Front Runner)

Technician.description_game: Moderately increase ability to navigate smoothly. (Pace Chaser)

Determined Descent.description_game: Moderately improve running on a downhill. (Pace Chaser)

Shatterproof.description_game: Moderately increase acceleration when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Pace Chaser)

Feel the Burn!.description_game: Moderately increase acceleration in an attempt to move up on a corner late-race.
Feel the Burn!.description_detailed: Gain a slight increase in acceleration as you attempt to gain positions during the last corner of the race

Red Shift/LP1211-M.description_game: Increase acceleration by shifting gears when positioned toward the front on the final corner or later.
Red Shift/LP1211-M.description_detailed: Be close to the Pace Chaser at the final corner to increase your acceleration by changing gears

Shooting for Victory!.description_game: Increase acceleration with a pow, a wow, and a bang when well-positioned on the final corner.

Let's Pump Some Iron!.description_game: Increase acceleration in an attempt to move up on a corner late-race.
Let's Pump Some Iron!.description_detailed: Increase acceleration as you attempt to overtake on a corner in the late-race or beyond

Angling and Scheming.description_game: Increase acceleration at an opportune moment when in the lead on a corner late-race.
Angling and Scheming.description_detailed: If you're in the first position on any corner in the late-race or beyond, your acceleration will increase

Condor's Fury.description_game: Increase acceleration with blazing passion when aiming for the front from midpack on the final corner.
Condor's Fury.description_detailed: During the last corner, gain acceleration when aiming for the lead from the middle of the pack

Corner Acceleration ×.description_game: Moderately decrease acceleration on a corner with awkward turning.

Go with the Flow.description_detailed: Become a little better at positioning during the late-race of the race

Meticulous Measures.description_game: Moderately prepare to make for the finish line mid-race. (Sprint)

Thunderbolt Step.description_game: Moderately avoid becoming surrounded when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Medium)

Dodging Danger.description_game: Moderately avoid becoming surrounded early-race. (Front Runner)

Lane Legerdemain.description_detailed: Become a little better at positioning during the late-race of the race

Perfect Prep!.description_game: Prepare to make for the finish line mid-race. (Sprint)

Lightning Step.description_game: Avoid becoming surrounded when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Medium)

Sixth Sense.description_detailed: Front Runner・Become harder to box in during early-race

Focus.description_game: Slightly decrease time lost to slow starts.
Focus.description_detailed: Your Start Reaction Time is slightly improved

Concentration.description_game: Decrease time lost to slow starts.
Concentration.description_detailed: Your Start Reaction Time is improved

Gatekept.description_game: Moderately increase time lost to slow starts.
Gatekept.description_detailed: Worse at starts, lightly increases delay of Late Starts

Hawkeye.description_game: Moderately widen field of view with heightened observation early-race. (Medium)
Hawkeye.description_detailed: Medium・Lightly sharpens observation skills during the early-race, widening field of vision

Studious.description_game: Slightly widen field of view with heightened observation mid-race. (Late Surger)
Studious.description_detailed: Late Surger・Slightly sharpens observation skills during the mid-race, widening field of vision a little

I Can See Right Through You.description_game: Slightly widen field of view with situational awareness when moving sideways. (End Closer)
I Can See Right Through You.description_detailed: End Closer・Grasp the situation when moving left-right, slightly widening field of vision

Strategist.description_game: Slightly widen field of view when positioned toward the back late-race. (End Closer)
Strategist.description_detailed: End Closer・Slightly widens field of vision when behind in late-race

Clairvoyance.description_game: Widen field of view with heightened observation early-race. (Medium)
Clairvoyance.description_detailed: Medium・Sharpens observation skills during the early-race, widening field of vision

The Bigger Picture.description_game: Widen field of view with heightened observation mid-race. (Late Surger)
The Bigger Picture.description_detailed: Late Surger・Sharpens observation skills in mid-race, widening field of vision a little

The Coast Is Clear!.description_game: Moderately widen field of view with situational awareness when moving sideways. (End Closer)
The Coast Is Clear!.description_detailed: End Closer・Grasp the situation when moving left-right, lightly widening field of vision

Crusader.description_game: Widen field of view when positioned toward the back late-race. (End Closer)
Crusader.description_detailed: End Closer・Widens field of vision when behind in late-race

Ignited Spirit SPD.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly increasing velocity in proportion to the total Speed of racing team members mid-race.
Ignited Spirit SPD.description_detailed: During the mid-race, the higher the total speed of your team, the more your speed increases

Ignited Spirit GUTS.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, very slightly increasing vigor in proportion to the total Guts of racing team members late-race.
Ignited Spirit GUTS.description_detailed: During the late-race, the higher the total guts of your team, the more your speed and acceleration increase

Burning Spirit SPD.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing velocity in proportion to the total Speed of racing team members mid-race.
Burning Spirit SPD.description_detailed: During the mid-race, the higher the total speed of your team, the more your speed increases

Burning Spirit GUTS.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing vigor in proportion to the total Guts of racing team members late-race.
Burning Spirit GUTS.description_detailed: During the late-race, the higher the total guts of your team, the more your speed and acceleration increase

Ignited Spirit STA.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly recovering endurance in proportion to the total Stamina of racing team members mid-race.
Ignited Spirit STA.description_detailed: During the mid-race, the higher the total stamina of your team, the more your stamina recovers

Burning Spirit STA.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, recovering endurance in proportion to the total Stamina of racing team members mid-race.
Burning Spirit STA.description_detailed: During the mid-race, the higher the total stamina of your team, the more your stamina recovers

Ignited Spirit PWR.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly increasing acceleration in proportion to the total Power of racing team members late-race.
Ignited Spirit PWR.description_detailed: During the late-race, the higher the total power of your team, the more your acceleration increases

Burning Spirit PWR.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing acceleration in proportion to the total Power of racing team members late-race.
Burning Spirit PWR.description_detailed: During the late-race, the higher the total power of your team, the more your acceleration increases

Ignited Spirit WIT.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, slightly increasing strategic navigation in proportion to the total Wit of racing team members early-race.
Ignited Spirit WIT.description_detailed: During the early-race, the higher the total wisdom of your team, the better your positioning becomes

Burning Spirit WIT.description_game: Burn bright with team spirit, increasing strategic navigation in proportion to the total Wit of racing team members early-race.
Burning Spirit WIT.description_detailed: During the early-race, the higher the total wisdom of your team, the better your positioning becomes

Hesitant Front Runners.description_game: Slightly decrease velocity of front runners late-race.
Hesitant Front Runners.description_detailed: Instil hesitation and slows down girls with <Strategy・Front Runner> in the late-race

Hesitant Pace Chasers.description_game: Slightly decrease velocity of pace chasers late-race.
Hesitant Pace Chasers.description_detailed: Instil hesitation and slows down girls with <Strategy・Pace Chaser> in the late-race

Hesitant Late Surgers.description_game: Slightly decrease velocity of late surgers late-race.
Hesitant Late Surgers.description_detailed: Instil hesitation and slows down girls with <Strategy・Late Surger> in the late-race

Hesitant End Closers.description_game: Slightly decrease velocity of end closers late-race.
Hesitant End Closers.description_detailed: Instil hesitation and slows down girls with <Strategy・End Closer> in the late-race

Intimidate.description_game: Moderately intimidate runners behind when positioned toward the front early-race. (Sprint)

Speed Eater.description_game: Slightly steal velocity from runners behind when in the lead mid-race. (Mile)

Tether.description_game: Slightly decrease velocity of runners ahead when positioned toward the back late-race. (Medium)
Tether.description_detailed: Medium・Slightly slows down girls in the front if you're behind in late-race

Intense Gaze.description_game: Slightly unnerve runners in focus late-race. (End Closer)
Intense Gaze.description_detailed: End Closer・Slightly unnerve girls you set your sights on in the late-race

Greed for Speed.description_game: Moderately steal velocity from runners behind when in the lead mid-race. (Mile)

Dominator.description_game: Decrease velocity of runners ahead when positioned toward the back late-race. (Medium)
Dominator.description_detailed: Medium・Slows down girls in the front if you're behind in late-race

Petrifying Gaze.description_game: Unnerve runners in focus late-race. (End Closer)
Petrifying Gaze.description_detailed: End Closer・At a random point during the late-race, you will decrease the speed of all enemies in your field of view

Adored by All.description_game: Intimidate runners behind when positioned toward the front early-race. (Sprint)

Opening Gambit.description_game: Slightly dull movement for runners ahead when positioned toward the back early-race. (Mile)

Restart.description_game: Slightly startle runners ahead when failing to get a lead early-race. (Front Runner)

Battle Formation.description_game: Dull movement for runners ahead when positioned toward the back early-race. (Mile)

Frenzied Front Runners.description_game: Increase time needed for front runners to calm down when they become rushed.

Frenzied Pace Chasers.description_game: Increase time needed for pace chasers to calm down when they become rushed.

Frenzied Late Surgers.description_game: Increase time needed for late surgers to calm down when they become rushed.

Frenzied End Closers.description_game: Increase time needed for end closers to calm down when they become rushed.

Trick (Front).description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for rushed runners behind when positioned toward the front mid-race.

Trick (Rear).description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for rushed runners ahead when positioned toward the back mid-race.

Subdued Front Runners.description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for front runners early-race.
Subdued Front Runners.description_detailed: Restrain and slightly tire out girls with <Strategy・Front Runner> in the early-race

Flustered Front Runners.description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for front runners mid-race.
Flustered Front Runners.description_detailed: Panic and slightly tire out girls with <Strategy・Front Runner> in mid-race

Subdued Pace Chasers.description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for pace chasers early-race.
Subdued Pace Chasers.description_detailed: Restrain and slightly tire out girls with <Strategy・Pace Chaser> in the early-race

Flustered Pace Chasers.description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for pace chasers mid-race.
Flustered Pace Chasers.description_detailed: Panic and slightly tire out girls with <Strategy・Pace Chaser> in the mid-race

Subdued Late Surgers.description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for late surgers early-race.
Subdued Late Surgers.description_detailed: Restrain and slightly tire out girls with <Strategy・Late Surger> in the early-race

Flustered Late Surgers.description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for late surgers mid-race.
Flustered Late Surgers.description_detailed: Panic and slightly tire out girls with <Strategy・Late Surger> in mid-race

Subdued End Closers.description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for end closers early-race.
Subdued End Closers.description_detailed: Restrain and slightly tire out girls with <Strategy・End Closer> in the early-race

Flustered End Closers.description_game: Slightly increase fatigue for end closers mid-race.
Flustered End Closers.description_detailed: Panic and slightly tire out girls with <Strategy・End Closer> in mid-race

Stop Right There!.description_game: Slightly cause panic in runners ahead when positioned toward the back early-race. (Sprint)

Murmur.description_game: Slightly disturb runners directly ahead mid-race. (Medium)
Murmur.description_detailed: Medium・Slightly confuses the girls right in front of you in mid-race

Stamina Eater.description_game: Very slightly steal endurance from runners ahead when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Long)
Stamina Eater.description_detailed: Long・If you're in the back at a random point during the mid-race, you will drain stamina from enemy girls ahead of you, and your own stamina will slightly recover

Sharp Gaze.description_game: Slightly startle other runners late-race. (Late Surger)
Sharp Gaze.description_detailed: Late Surger・Slightly flusters other girls in late-race

You've Got No Shot.description_game: Cause panic in runners ahead when positioned toward the back early-race. (Sprint)

Mystifying Murmur.description_detailed: Medium・Confuses the girls right in front of you in mid-race

Stamina Siphon.description_game: Moderately steal endurance from runners ahead when positioned toward the back mid-race. (Long)

All-Seeing Eyes.description_detailed: Late Surger・Flusters other girls in late-race

Smoke Screen.description_game: Moderately narrow the field of view for runners ahead late-race. (Long)
Smoke Screen.description_detailed: Long・Lightly narrows the field of vision of girls in the front in late-race

Disorient.description_game: Slightly narrow the field of view for runners behind when positioned toward the front late-race. (Pace Chaser)
Disorient.description_detailed: Pace Chaser・Slightly narrows the field of view of girls in the back when in Front in late-race

Illusionist.description_game: Narrow the field of view for runners ahead late-race. (Long)
Illusionist.description_detailed: Long・Narrows the field of vision of girls in the front in late-race

Dazzling Disorientation.description_game: Moderately narrow the field of view for runners behind when positioned toward the front late-race. (Pace Chaser)
Dazzling Disorientation.description_detailed: Pace Chaser・Lightly narrows the field of vision of girls in the back when in front in late-race
